title: I am not able to install truffle on my laptop
body:
Getting thi issue 

PS C:\Users\Deepesh> npm install truffle -g

Hey @Digi0224, I think there are two ways to deal with this. I think when installing Node on Windows you need to make sure that you check a box that shows up that installs extra build tools. Or you can downgrade npm to version 6 which is less than ideal. Let me know how it goes!

maybe it's crashed by npm audit finding some security problems, you can user the commod `npm i -g truffle --no-audit` , but that maybe caused some security problems in you laptop. I think truffle should fix this problem as soon as possible.
No @nocsg, this is an error caused by out-of-date build tools alongside versions of npm above version 6.
Closing this for issue maintenance.  @Digi0224, let us know if there's still a problem after trying @eggplantzzz's suggestions and perhaps we can reopen this.
